1370: Hardenbernus moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Nellen at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Nellen, Badeloghen, at age 33.
1372: Had a daughter with Nellen, Hildegardis, at age 35.
1373: Had a daughter with Nellen, Amalburga, at age 36.
1375: Had a son with Nellen, Piak, at age 38.
Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 6 years old.
Lost son Piak when Piak was 1 years old.
1381: Lost daughter Hildegardis when Hildegardis was 10 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Became caretaker of Amalburga at age 45.
